meanings.definition: A bird of prey with long pointed wings and a notched beak, typically catching prey by diving on it from above.
meanings.sent1: Falcons soar high in the sky, searching for their next meal.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of falcons hunting together in the forest.
meanings.sent3: Why did the falcons refuse to play hide and seek? Because they always catch their prey!
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was like a falcon diving towards its target.
meanings.sent5: The image of falcons diving for food is etched in my mind.

meanings.definition: A professional American football team based in Atlanta, Georgia.
meanings.sent1: The Falcons won the championship last year with their strong teamwork.
meanings.sent2: Fans cheered loudly for the Falcons at the stadium.
meanings.sent3: Why did the Falcons bring a ladder to the game? To reach new heights in their performance!
meanings.sent4: The Falcons' offense was like a well-coordinated flock of birds.
meanings.sent5: The red and black colors of the Falcons' uniforms stood out on the field.
